availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Clay Hanks (Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Hanks and Sarah Hanks. Married Nancy E. Baird Hanks in Carroll County on March 9, 1858. Resident in Carroll County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 177B, 178A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 110.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carroll County Marriages, Film #000414689, p. 415.
Find A Grave, "Henry Clay Hanks(1836-1892)," Memorial #29766948, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29766948 (accessed June 16, 2020).
